ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of MAMERTO C. GERONIMO of Mississauga, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective August 18, 2008.
